mapper.insert: insert into member (group, id, pw, name, nickname, email, phone ,gender, intro, pic) values ('A',#{id},#{pw},#{name},#{nickname},#{gender},#{email},#{phone}, #{gender}, #{intro}, #{pic})
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
mapper.update: update member set name=#{name}, nickname=#{nickname}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, gender=#{gender}, intro=#{intro}, pick=#{pick} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from member order by num desc
